description:
Cole Alone Once More ...
Cole is over visiting one day and decides he's horny. I was busy doing website updates so I set the camera up and give him the remote so he can zoom in and out himself. I tell him to go ahead and direct his own solo and he does. What a show this young man puts on for us. He's so beautiful and can captivate anyone's attention if not with his huge cock and beautifully sculpted body at least with his model-worthy face and beautiful smile. Personally for me there is something about that cute angelic face and those pretty eyes along with that sneaky little smile that sends me over the edge every time. Cole is surely one of the best finds we've had in some time and we plan to keep him around.
title: Cole
